Html:
Hi Radioman!

Is in ServerAndCache Mode a Default cache activated? (i think SQLite?)
Or do i have to set the ImageCacheSecond manualy to SQLitePureImageCache (or any other caching provider)?

thanks,
Manuel

ImageCacheSecond  is Second, it's null by default, but if you deploy your application in LAN with database server, you can set it and boost first tile loading on all clients.

p.s. First cache is ServerAndCache, and it's activated by default with sqlite
